title: Use AR for Remote Assistance
description: A junior technician is struggling with a complex repair and uses an Augmented Reality (AR) headset to get help from a senior expert.

tasks.description: Initiate a remote assistance call from the AR device.
tasks.expected_outcome: The junior technician starts a video call with a remote expert.

tasks.description: Share their point-of-view video stream with the remote expert.
tasks.expected_outcome: The remote expert can see exactly what the on-site technician sees.

tasks.description: Receive on-screen annotations and instructions from the expert to guide the repair.
tasks.expected_outcome: The expert draws circles and arrows on the screen to highlight the correct components, guiding the technician to a successful repair.
